backend/main.mo: Main actor defining data types (Task, ChecklistItem, Goal, PerformanceRating, Reflection) and CRUD operations for tasks, dailies, goals, performance ratings, and reflections with Map-based storage and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds a reflections Map to existing actor state, initializing it as empty for users upgrading from the old schema.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: DailyReflection component creation, React Query hooks for reflection operations, and integration into DateDetailsPanel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component responsibilities, styling approach, and mobile-responsive design patterns.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm earth tones (terracotta, sage, cream).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with ThemeProvider, responsive grid layout organizing Calendar, DailyChecklist, FutureGoals, and TaskList components with Header, Footer, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Calendar.tsx: Interactive calendar component with month navigation, task indicators, performance rating indicators, touch-friendly date selection (44px targets), and DateDetailsPanel integration for selected dates.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItem.ts: Individual checklist item with touch-friendly checkbox (44px minimum), toggle functionality via useToggleDaily hook, and responsive text wrapping with strikethrough for completed items.
frontend/src/components/DailyChecklist.t: Displays a daily checklist card with progress tracking, allowing users to add, view, and manage checklist items with completion status.
Provides a textarea for daily reflection notes with auto-save functionality (1 second debounce) and displays Sanskrit text "एकत्रा" and "वीर भोग्या वसुंधरा".
frontend/src/components/DateDetailsPanel: Shows a detailed panel for a selected date including performance rating, daily reflection, and task list with completed/incomplete counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with attribution to caffeine.ai and copyright information.
frontend/src/components/FutureGoals.tsx: Displays a card for managing future goals with target dates, allowing users to add new goals and view existing ones.
frontend/src/components/GoalItem.tsx: Renders an individual goal item with checkbox, text, target date, and overdue indicator.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, Internet Identity login/logout functionality, and truncated principal display.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceRatin: Provides a 1-10 rating interface for daily performance tracking with button grid layout.
frontend/src/components/TaskForm.tsx: Form component for creating new tasks with title, description, and due date fields, converting dates to nanoseconds for Internet Computer.
frontend/src/components/TaskItem.tsx: Displays an individual task with toggle completion status, due date, overdue indicator, and optional compact mode.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: React component that displays tasks in two sections (active and completed), with a form to add new tasks, loading skeletons, and responsive mobile-first design using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically recreating the actor and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for managing tasks, daily checklist items, goals, performance ratings, and reflections with CRUD operations, toast notifications, and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-tone color palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH values, typography, container queries, animations, and responsive breakpoints for the productivity application design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features including calendar view, task management, daily checklist, authentication, and responsive design for a desktop-focused progress tracking application.
